name: Royal Roads 3 Portal
description:
The kingdom Laina has led in recent years has not known trouble, and all life has been peaceful and quiet. But Laina knew that magic was closely intertwined with reality, and sooner or later the days of trouble would come, and evil would reoccur.

Time management is a genre in which you must harvest crops, mine stone, process wood and allocate resources intelligently in real time to complete level objectives in the allotted time. As you progress through the game, you can improve the available resources using the rewards you earn.

In the game you are waiting for:
- 4 colorful fantasy locations
- 50 captivating levels of varying difficulty
- 10 additional levels
- 4 unique locations
- Simple controls and a well-designed tutorial
- Over 20 hours of exciting gameplay for all ages
